item.title: coFood Vancouver
item.description: Weâ€™re a collective of neighbours and projects doing good work in our food communities. coFood Vancouver wants to hear from you.

item.title: Community Garden Dinners
item.description: Evening gatherings in the garden, approximately monthly. We’re just getting started so the later months are likely to shift. Join us in the [[coFood Collaborative Garden]] between 5pm - 8pm.
